sub_title: Finance Accounting& Controlling//Supply Chain Operation & Management
summary:
I have graduated from University of Finance & Warsaw School of Economy : Master of Finance and Banking. My Postgraduate studies was foreign trade & logistic. I easily adapt to new working environment and have been working in multinational company such as:  Newell Rubbermaid B.V EMEA ,Flint Group,Wex Fleet located in Holland and Bank Zachodni WBK (Santander Bank Group located in Poland) . 
I have experience working across different countries in Europe and rest of the world with different time zones.
I have been doing accounting finance and control and logistics supply management for different countries across the Europe and Saudi Arabia and UK, Australia,New Zealand &USA 

I have also experience with Logistic ,Supply Chain Management,3rd party providers,creating processes and manage it from the begin till the end(complexity).
I have experience with Warehouse and factories with chemicals and DGD(dangerous goods) Rotterdam-port shipments all over the world 🌎 creating processes and being responsible for real shipments.I am also finance controller to recheck all finance from AP/AR/GL Accounting.
I am good communicator,  well organized,  polite, fast learner  hard-working, and punctual,  tolerant pro-active in resolving problems,advanced user in SAP&other accounting systems.
 
I work well under pressure while inspiring confidence in others around me through excitement and enthusiasm
I am a multilingual financial specialist distinguished by strong analytical, negotiation and problem solving skills.

The language skills as follows:
Polish: mother language;
English: fluent;
Dutch: the independent user ( level NT2).

location.default: Loon op Zand, North Brabant, Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Monitoring & handling inbound materials to the different sites and regions all over the world.
-In charge of purchasing to external and internal vendors and tracking of the goods related to the order
-overlooking the Export-Import and warehouse    processes
-Manage daily customer enquiries, order processing& invoicing 
-Co-coordinating with our 3rd party Logistics Service providers for orders being shipped 
-Good communication towards our Raw materials  suppliers/logistics providers and customers 
-Make sure that the administration is fully aligned with  the physical flows and reach out to the production sites and or suppliers when necessary
Bringing different stock points, spread around Europe  together
-Inventory planning to meet business requirements
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Logistic Raw Material Planner/Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Financial Accountant
function: General Accounting/Controlling
Tasks:
- preparation of journal entries, accounts check, accruals, balancesheet reconciliations 
-MEC (Month End Closing) run activities within timetable and providing Controller with financial 
  information,
- set up & control ICO payments & recharges process
- support and preparation documents for external audit(ex: PwC, Deloitte)&internal purposes
-Balance Sheet accounts reconciliation and maintenance on financial processes
-Responsible for receiving, reviewing and posting all accounting records ,
-Control ,Analyzing & Manage AP/AR/GL accounts for operational invoices to identify discrepancies
-Approval & payment process of invoices,
-Other tasks assigned by management
